p: Similarly, for peak week the average forecast scores improved as the peak week approached. With the exception of a large dip in accuracy in HHS Region 7 just after the peak occured (due to revisions to observed wILI data in the weeks surrounding peak), the forecast scores for peak week tended to be high in the weeks following peak. The average score in more than half of the regions was greater than 0.75 for all weeks after peak.
